name: word-counter
title: Word Counter
description: Count words, characters, lines, sentences, and paragraphs in text documents
content:
Overview

This application analyzes text files and provides detailed statistics including word count, character count, line count, and more.

Features

  • Count total and unique words
  • Count characters with and without spaces
  • Count lines (total and non-empty)
  • Count sentences and paragraphs
  • Calculate average word length

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload your text file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a statistics report with the suffix '_stats.txt' containing comprehensive text analysis.
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "prod_apps/python/word_counter.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
